content:
flowchart LR
    start[Start] -->|User clicks "Request Phone Swap" button|> modal[Modal: Request Phone Swap]
    modal -->|User selects phone to request and offers one in exchange|> form[Form: Phone to Request & Phone to Exchange]
    form -->|User submits form|> backend[Backend API Endpoint (POST /api/phone-swaps)]
    backend -->|Validate user's ownership of offered phone|> validation[Validation: User is owner of offered phone]
    validation -->|Request is valid, create new swap request in database|> db[Database: Create new swap request table]
    db -->|Return confirmation message to user|> confirm[Confirmation Message: Request submitted successfully]
    confirm -->|Modal closes, display confirmation message|> end[End]
    modal -->|User cancels request|> cancel[Cancel Request]
    cancel -->|Modal closes|> end

metadata.meeting_notes:
Phone Swap Request Feature
Date: October 14, 2025
Attendees: Product Manager, UX Designer, Lead Frontend Developer, Lead Backend Developer
Objective: Define the requirements and implementation plan fo

attempts.content:
Here is a Mermaid flowchart that represents the Phone Swap Request Feature:

```mermaid
flowchart LR
    start[Start] -->|User clicks "Request Phone Swap" button|> modal[Modal: Request Phone Swap]
    modal -->|User selects phone to request and offers one in exchange|> form[Form: Phone to Request & Phone to Exchange]
    form -->|User submits form|> backend[Backend API Endpoint (POST /api/phone-swaps)]
    backend -->|Validate user's ownership of offered phone|> validation[Validation: User is owner of offered phone]
    validation -->|Request is valid, create new swap request in database|> db[Database: Create new swap request table]
    db -->|Return confirmation message to user|> confirm[Confirmation Message: Request submitted successfully]
    confirm -->|Modal closes, display confirmation message|> end[End]

    modal -->|User cancels request|> cancel[Cancel Request]
    cancel -->|Modal closes|> end
```

Let me know if you'd like me to make any changes!

content:
flowchart LR
    start[Start] -->|User clicks "Request Phone Swap" button|> modal[Modal: Request Phone Swap]
    classDef primary fill:#4f46e5,stroke:#3730a3
    modal -.-> form[Form: Phone to Request & Phone to Exchange]
    form -->|User submits form|> backend[Backend API Endpoint (POST /api/phone-swaps)]
    backend -->|Validate user's ownership of offered phone|> validation[Validation: User is owner of offered phone]
    validation -->|Request is valid, create new swap request in database|> db[Database: Create new swap request table]
    db -->|Return confirmation message to user|> confirm[Confirmation Message: Request submitted successfully]
    confirm -.-> confirm[Confirmation Message: Request submitted successfully]
    confirm -.-> end[End]
    modal -->|User cancels request|> cancel[Cancel Request]
    cancel -.-> end[End]
Let me know if you have any further requests!
